author: craigmcc
msg: Improve the global build scripts to pass on key environment variables in
corresponding Ant variables.  The "build.bat" script has not been tested
yet -- that will happen in a few minutes.
The scripts will not build the "bsf" subproject unless the required JAR
files are on your classpath.  Flexibility in defining the location of
these JAR files will be added later.
The scripts will not build the "xsl" subproject unless the required JAR
files (xalan.jar and xerces.jar) are in locations defined by the XALAN_JAR
and XERCES_JAR environment variables, with defaults listed in the comments
at the top of the "build.sh" and "build.bat" scripts.

author: rubys
msg: 1) Only compile the taglibs for which the dependencies are present
2) Comment out steps that don't apply
3) Remove extra CR's on each line in bsf/build.xml

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a custom tag library that enables IBM's Bean Scripting Framework
(BSF) that supports the use of multiple scripting languages in JSP pages,
instead of just Java.
Submitted by:	Doug Davis <dug@us.ibm.com>
